fitness_thick_mess: Eating a moderate diet will increase weight
fitness_level_one_fat: You are in the first level of fat position
fitness_level_one_fat_mess: You need to eat selectively and exercise
fitness_extra_level_two_fat: You are in the second level of fat position

fitness_die: You are in the final level of fat position
